name: Validate airplane type field constraints

testSteps.description: 1: Validate airplane type field constraints ({input=A, errorMessage=El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres})

children.description: Given I am on the airplane registration page
user opens the pages.airplaneRegisterUrl page
When I enter "A" as the airplane type
User fill airplane form task
user enters 'A' into Airplane type input
User blur field interaction
Then I should see an error message "El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres" for the field "airplaneType"
user should see text of Error message about airplane type that is equal to: <"El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres">

testSteps.description: 2: Validate airplane type field constraints ({input=, errorMessage=El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres})

children.description: Given I am on the airplane registration page
user opens the pages.airplaneRegisterUrl page

User fill airplane form task
user enters '' into Airplane type input
User blur field interaction
Then I should see an error message "El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres" for the field "airplaneType"
user should see text of Error message about airplane type that is equal to: <"El tipo de avión debe tener entre 2 y 50 caracteres">
